word: THE GOSPEL WILL MAKE RAPID PROGRESS AS A RESULT OF PRAYER.—God would work mightily for His people today if they would place themselves wholly under His guidance. They need the constant abiding of the Holy Spirit. If there were more prayer in the councils of those bearing responsibilities, more humbling of the heart before God, we should see abundant evidence of divine leadership, and our work would make rapid progress.—(Testimonies for the Church, vol. 8, 238.)
